name: Never Get to Hold You
content: You know I didn't mean it darling
你知道，那并非我本意，亲爱的
如此甜蜜，好似熹微晨光
All I want is to hold you
Make you rock away this feeling for me
为了我，把所有感受抛一旁
You know I didn't mean it
Until I saw you in my thunderstorm
直到我在电闪雷鸣中看到你
I never get to hold you
As long as I want to
还记得吗，我曾告诉过你
I never get to hold you
As long as I want to
还记得吗，我曾告诉过你
哦，小甜心，小辣椒，你无比美好
Just say you'll stay the night
你只需说，今晚你会留下来
I need you till the morning light
我需要你在我身边，直至晨光熹微
Cause oh darling don't you know
因为，哦，亲爱的，难道你不明白
My only heart is beating for you
You know I didn't mean it
Until I saw you in my thunderstorm
直到我在电闪雷鸣中看到你
I never get to hold you
As long as I want to
还记得吗，我曾告诉过你
I never get to hold you
As long as I want to
还记得吗，我曾告诉过你
The way I do  the way I do
都不能像我这般了解你
Know you'll let it go to head
The way I do  the way I do
都不能像我这般了解你
I know you'll let it go to head
I never get to hold you
As long as I want to
还记得吗，我曾告诉过你
I never get to hold you
As long as I want to
还记得吗，我曾告诉过你
